entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 06:57 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -30.8°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.0°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
